campaign_bonus_value_ids_projectile.notes: Percentage modifier. Contributes to reload time adjustment in unit stats for land units. Used at unit scope. Positive value reduces reload time. Affects stats value m_reload_time_modifier. Total effect is clamped to 100%. Used in BATTLE_SETUP::battle_setup_unit. ID is CAMPAIGN_BONUS_VALUE_ID_PROJECTILE_RELOAD_MOD
Is the projectile enabled for towers on a settlement. Used at region bonuses
